001package gust.backend.model;
002
003import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
004
005
006/** Describes options involved with operations to persist model entities. */
007public interface WriteOptions extends OperationOptions {
008  /** Default set of write operation options. */
009  WriteOptions DEFAULTS = new WriteOptions() {};
010
011  /** Enumerates write attitudes with regard to existing record collisions. */
012  enum WriteDisposition {
013    /** We don't care. Just write it. */
014    BLIND,
015
016    /** The record must exist for the write to proceed (an <i>update</i> operation). */
017    MUST_EXIST,
018
019    /** The record must <b>not</b> exist for the write to proceed (a <i>create</i> operation). */
020    MUST_NOT_EXIST
021  }
022
023  /** @return Specifies the write mode for an operation. Overridden by some methods (for instance, {@code create}). */
024  default @Nonnull WriteDisposition writeMode() {
025    return WriteDisposition.BLIND;
026  }
027}
